pr_title: Add delay before retrying ingests due to checksum failure

timeline.bodyText: might be simpler to perform the delay in the ChecksumMismatchException catch, it already has a block to check if retries are remaining and the automatic result would be there wouldn't be a delay until after the first try.
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: rather than eating the interrupt, could you rethrow it as a JobInterruptedException? Shouldn't need an extra log statement in that case.
timeline.author: bbpennel
